title: How Liquid AI Is Challenging Transformer-Based AI Models
author: Kimberley Mok
description: A startup called Liquid AI claims that Liquid Foundational Models (LFMs) are superior to the transformer-based models made famous by ChatGPT.
cntitle: 液态人工智能如何挑战基于Transformer的AI模型
cndescription: 一家名为 Liquid AI 的初创公司声称，Liquid 基础模型 (LFM) 优于 ChatGPT 使其闻名的基于 Transformer 的模型。
